Carl Clark (1933-2015) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese foto na onye agha United States.
A mụrụ ya dị ka Carlton L

Clark na Boston, Massachusetts n'afọ 1933. Clark nọrọ ihe ka ukwuu n'akụkụ ikpeazụ nke ndụ ya na-arụ ọrụ na Baltimore, Maryland ebe ọ na-ewere echiche nke ndụ ndị Afrịka Amerịka. Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ agha atọ na Korea na Vietnam, ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ na Soshologi na Mahadum Nebraska, wee soro nzere bachelụ na Fine Arts na Maryland Institute College of Art.
Foto Clark anọwo na ngosi na Baltimore Museum of Art, Brooklyn Museum of Art

Maryland Art Place, Museum of Fine Arts, Houston, Museum of the National Center of Afro-Amerịkan Artists na Boston, Royal Photographic Society of England, Smithsonian Institution, na School 33 Art Center na Baltimore.
